title: Caught Between
description: Jackie, a seventeen year old cheetah shapeshifter and Garrett, her vampire lifemate travel to his maker's old villa where he tries to face down the demons of his past. With the help of an unexpected and unwelcome guest and a lovely surprise, Jackie is able to help Garrett find the peace he longs for.  But as soon as they're back at home, the usual craziness kicks in. The Rogues, Inc. team is called into action to help solve two local murders, plus Jackie's forced to confront her most hated enemy as he's judged before the Elders of Faerie. Finally, A wantonly violent act threatens to tear apart her family, leaving her once again determined to protect the people that she loves with her magic and her strength.
author: Gayle Parness
